name: World Atlas
description: An interactive map showcasing various places around the world.
title: World Atlas
Full_description: Fully responsive design with modular, reusable React components
Fetched and displayed country data including flags, capitals, currencies, and regions
Integrated Wikipedia links and a secondary API for historical and factual insights

Implemented animated transitions and hover effects using Framer Motion

name: Live Weather Website

name: BMI Calc with Hight Converter
description: calculate Body Mass Index (BMI) based on user input.
